short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chromium extension to generate a QR code for the current page you are on

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple, open source, extension that generates a QR code for the current active tab of your browser. No external connectivity needed. The site you are on is never sent anywhere.
